item.title: Inside our SIP jig borer tooling collection
item.description: Take a closer look at our tooling setup for a SIP jig borer. This video highlights the tools we rely on for accurate machining and consistent results. What makes a tooling collection truly effective?

media:content.media:title: Inside our SIP jig borer tooling collection
media:content.media:description: Take a closer look at our tooling setup for a SIP jig borer. This video highlights the tools we rely on for accurate machining and consistent results. What makes a tooling collection truly effective?

item.title: When a 150-tonne jacking cylinder fails on site
item.description: A real-world look at a 150-tonne jacking cylinder failure during an engineering job. We break down what went wrong, the challenges faced, and why safety and diagnostics matter in heavy machinery work. What can be learned from this failure?

item.title: Buying a lathe and an unexpected bonus
item.description: We share the experience of purchasing a lathe and discovering an unexpected advantage along the way. What factors make a used machine purchase turn out well?

item.title: Precision metal arc spraying on a D11 yoke
item.description: See how a D11 yoke is restored using metal arc spraying with the Metallisation i450. A close look at surface engineering in a heavy-duty workshop, supporting reliability in Caterpillar machinery. How does this process extend component life?

item.title: Preparing a heavy-duty tool post grinder
item.description: Follow the setup and preparation of a heavy-duty tool post grinder, focusing on adjustments, planning, and machining requirements. What steps are critical before putting this tool to work?

item.title: High-precision machinery at work
item.description: A closer look at precision machinery performing at a very high standard, highlighting accuracy, build quality, and engineering detail. What defines true precision in modern machining?

item.title: Building Heavy-Duty Rollers from Scratch
item.description: Watch the machining process behind creating durable, heavy-duty rollers designed for strength and reliability. From material choice to final fit, what makes a roller truly built to last?

item.title: Building a Custom Mount for a High-End Camera
item.description: Follow the step-by-step process of designing and fabricating a custom mount built to safely support a professional-grade camera. What goes into making sure precision equipment stays secure in real-world conditions?

item.title: Drilling a through-spindle coolant bolt
item.description: Using a parabolic drill to create a through-spindle coolant drawbar bolt, demonstrating precision machining and workshop techniques. How does this process improve tool performance and reliability?

item.title: Major repair on a stick cylinder
item.description: A detailed look at repairing a stick cylinder that requires extensive restoration, highlighting machining and structural fixes. How do professionals tackle heavy-duty cylinder repairs?

item.title: Threading airline pipes after corrosion
item.description: After persistent work, corroded airline holes are punched through and threaded, ready for wiring installation. What techniques ensure precision despite challenging conditions?

item.title: A custom bearing puller in progress
item.description: Follow the development of a custom bearing puller designed for automotive and heavy-duty applications, focusing on precision engineering and client needs. How do custom tools improve repair efficiency?

item.title: Full rebuild of a 150-tonne jacking cylinder
item.description: A complete rebuild of a 150-tonne hydraulic jacking cylinder, covering disassembly, machining, and reassembly. What challenges come with restoring equipment of this scale?

item.title: Inside a vintage vertical honing machine
item.description: Get to know a vintage vertical honing machine, exploring its design, operation, and role in precision machining. Why are older machines still valued in modern workshops?

item.title: Preventing engine damage on a Cummins 6BT
item.description: During Cummins 6BT preparation, a small but critical fix addresses the killer dowel pin issue. How can early prevention improve long-term engine reliability?

item.title: Replacing a Broken Eye on a Truck A-frame
item.description: The team repairs a truck A-frame by replacing a broken eye, using heavy-duty fabrication and precise fitting to restore safe, dependable operation.

item.title: Repairing a cracked hydraulic weld
item.description: See how a cracked weld in a hydraulic cylinder is repaired using machining, welding, and lathe work. What steps ensure the repair restores strength and safety?

item.title: Diagnosing a major hydraulic press leak
item.description: A closer look at a hydraulic press with a significant leak, focusing on inspection, causes, and repair considerations. What typically leads to large hydraulic system failures?

item.title: External weld repair using precision equipment
item.description: Watch our Sir Meccanica perform an external weld on a spigot using a shop-made bore welding stand. How does controlled welding improve alignment and strength?

item.title: Saving the Day: Cracked Excavator Cylinder Revived
item.description: A cracked excavator cylinder is brought back to life through careful inspection, welding, and precision machining, restoring strength and reliability for heavy-duty work.
